headline: Veolia Environnement: Still One Of The Best Plays In Water/Recycling Going Into Q3
summary: Veolia Environnement SA is rated a solid Buy due to undervaluation at this time, with a significant upside potential. Read more on VEOEY stock here.

headline: American Water Works (AWK) Margin Gains Reinforce Stable Narrative Despite Premium Valuation
summary: American Water Works Company (AWK) reported net profit margins of 21.9%, just above last year’s 21.8%, signaling stable profitability. Annual earnings growth accelerated to 13.1%, exceeding the five-year average of 5.1% per year. Earnings and revenue are forecast to rise 7.91% and 6.7% per year, respectively, both trailing broader US market estimates. The company’s ongoing profit and revenue growth boost sentiment, but investors remain mindful of risks around dividend sustainability and...

headline: Pennsylvania American Water Offers Customer Assistance Options
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., October 31, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water recognizes that customers may be facing financial challenges related to the government shutdown. The company offers several payment plans and assistance programs to support customers with their water and/or wastewater bill.

headline: Essential Utilities: I'm Holding Shares Ahead Of The Merger
summary: American Water Works plans to acquire Essential Utilities, creating a major U.S. water utility with greater scale and growth potential. Learn why WTRG stock is a hold.
